CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT(Core_Salesforce_Id__c, 3) = "001", "Account", IF( LEFT(Core_Salesforce_Id__c, 3) = "003", "Contact", IF( LEFT(Core_Salesforce_Id__c, 3) = "00Q", "Lead", IF( LEFT(Core_Salesforce_Id__c, 3) = "006", "Opportunity", IF( LEFT(Core_Salesforce_Id__c, 3) = "005", "User", IF( LEFT(Core_Salesforce_Id__c, 3) = "07k", "Account Contact Relation", IF( LEFT(Core_Salesforce_Id__c, 3) = "0JB", "ObjectTerritory2Association", "Other")))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Returns to which object the record causing the error belongs to
CustomField.label: Object
